members.joinCircumstances: Zeff was the captain of the Cook Pirates before the crew was lost in the storm.

keyMoments.title: Cook Pirates Attack Cruise Ship
keyMoments.description: Zeff's Cook Pirates attack a luxury cruise ship where young Sanji works as a cook, plundering the ship and beating the crew.
keyMoments.significance: The event that brings Zeff and Sanji together for the first time.

keyMoments.title: Cook Pirates Lost in Storm
keyMoments.description: The Cook Pirates' ship is destroyed in a massive storm, and Zeff becomes separated from his crew to save Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: The end of Zeff's pirate career and the beginning of his new life with Sanji.

ships.description: The pirate ship commanded by Zeff, destroyed in the storm that changed his and Sanji's lives.

statusHistory.reason: Crew was active during the attack on the cruise ship
Crew lost in the storm; Zeff retired from piracy
